San Francisco, CA H1B Welcome

Airbnb - http://www.airbnb.com/

We only have 27 engineers, and we need more!

I'm a backend engineer here, and we're hiring backend, frontend, mobile and ops engineers. Check out our (pretty sweet) jobs page: http://www.airbnb.com/jobs

I've been working at/founding startups for the last few years, and didn't think I would end up somewhere as "big" as Airbnb, but I love it here. Despite the large size of our customer service operations worldwide, the entire product team (PMs + engineers + designers) is still ~40 people, there's still a lot to do, and we need help doing it :)
